Tum janoo

Sunno

Haan

Chand taaron ka toh pata nhi

Lekin tere liye samose ke saath

Teri pasandeeda chutney zarur khilaunga

Tujhe kuch kehne me

Jhijhak hogi toh tere dil ki

Awaaz banjaunga

Tu haan toh kar

Mein teri rooh mein bhi samajaunga

Kaam mein tera haath zarur bataunga

Tu subha ki coffee banayegi

Toh shaam ki chai mein banaunga

Tu mujhe apni kahaniya sunana

Mein tere liye apne geet gaunga

Tu meri heer toh banja

Mein tera ranjha banjaunga

Kon sa naasa kiya beta

Hai koi ek uska hi
